member.name: M:Gravity.Extensions.CollectionExtensions.DistinctBy``2(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Func{``0,``1})
member.summary: Returns all distinct elements of the given source, where "distinctness" is determined via a projection and the default equality comparer for the projected type
member.returns: A sequence consisting of distinct elements from the source sequence, comparing them by the specified key projection.
member.remarks: This operator uses deferred execution and streams the results, although a set of already-seen keys is retained. If a key is seen multiple times, only the first element with that key is returned.

member.name: M:Gravity.Extensions.CollectionExtensions.DistinctBy``2(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Func{``0,``1},System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer{``1})
member.summary: Returns all distinct elements of the given source, where "distinctness" is determined via a projection and the default equality comparer for the projected type
member.param: The equality comparer to use to determine whether or not keys are equal. If null, the default equality comparer for TSource is used.
member.returns: A sequence consisting of distinct elements from the source sequence, comparing them by the specified key projection.
member.remarks: This operator uses deferred execution and streams the results, although a set of already-seen keys is retained. If a key is seen multiple times, only the first element with that key is returned.

member.summary: Parse a collection strings into a collection of integers.
member.param: A collection of strings to parse.
member.remarks: If the string object cannot be parsed it will be ignored and will not be returned.
